channel.title: Server Help
channel.description: Ok.. I followed the server guides and I have my server running to where I can connect to it, but nobody else can, they say it's offline. What could I be doing wrong? I've let my port through my firewall, I have my no ip setup. Help.

item.title: Server Help
item.dc:creator: @Ryu870 Ryu870
item.description:
@Ryu870 wrote:

Ok… I followed the server guides and I have my server running to where I can connect to it, but nobody else can, they say it’s offline. What could I be doing wrong? I’ve let my port through my firewall, I have my no ip setup. Help.

Read full topic
